JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a highly motivated, talented and experienced attorney to lead Facebook’s Legal Privacy Team supporting privacy issues in our core messaging product, Messenger.  This role is product-focused and the ideal candidate will be eager to roll up their sleeves and problem-solve on complex, strategic, privacy-forward issues, working closely with cross-functional partners and other legal teams to develop innovative compliance solutions to support these suites of products and services. It’s an opportunity to lead on some of Facebook’s most critical and challenging issues around messaging.  You will be joining a collaborative team of privacy lawyers who identify, evaluate and address privacy risk in light of privacy laws, compliance obligations and policies, train on privacy matters, and collaborate closely with other legal teams as well as cross-functional privacy partners to deliver legal advice globally. We are looking for a candidate who has a solid understanding of global privacy laws and principles, is motivated, independent, collaborates well, is able to think strategically and holistically on
